home.ultimateGuide: The Ultimate Guide to Find a Maid or Nanny!
home.ultimateGuideDesc: Explore our easy resources, including interview questions and tips, to help you find the perfect maid or nanny for your family. We've created a simple, step-by-step guide that covers everything from identifying your specific needs to checking references and qualifications. You'll find helpful advice on how to assess their experience, personality, and reliability. With our expert tips, you can confidently ask the right questions during interviews, ensuring you hire someone trustworthy and capable. Whether you need help with cleaning, childcare, or both, we'll help you make an informed decision and find the best fit for your home and family.

about.heading: About Us

about.sectionDescription: Simplifying the quest for reliable household helpers and nannies. Your one-stop solution for a happy home and peace of mind. Connect with dedicated helpers worthy of your trust and value your needs.

faq.heading: Frequently asked questions
faq.subHeading: we help you connect with families and domestic workers to find their needs.

question1.q: How can I find a maid using Pickmymaid?
question1.a: Once you register with Pickmymaid( fee starting from 350AED), you have access to all their contact and details.The desired salary of each maid is mentioned on their profiles.You can call and interview them to discuss the conditions and salary to find the perfect maid you need.You can then hire her and sponsor her directly. Pickmymaid does not provide sponsorship but the platform facilitates the hiring process.

question2.q: Does Pickmymaid verify the profiles that are posted?
question2.a: Yes, At Pickmymaid we take profile verification very seriously. All maids who register on our website undergo an interview and filtration process by our onboarding team. Even though we encourage you to re-check their information and ideally call their previous employer to know their feedback.

question3.q: Is there any ongoing service or customer service available?
question3.a: If you are not satisfied with our service, you can easily contact us and our customer care agent will communicate with you.

question4.q: What is the salary range for the maid?
question4.a: The monthly salary for maids on Pickmymaid ranges from 1200AED to 3500AED. The desired salary of each maid is mentioned on their profiles, allowing you to easily find a candidate within your budget.

question5.q: Can I access the database without purchasing an access package?
question5.a: Yes, you can access all the listed maids as a website visitor. However, you will need to purchase an access package to complete the information and contact details of the listed maids. By unlocking the access package you will get the complete information and contact details of the maid, which help you to make direct inquiries and find the right fit for you.

question6.q: Are the maids sponsored/ have their visas?
question6.a: Pickmymaid is not an agency and we do not sponsor the maids or nannies. Sponsorship must be taken by the employer. It is the employer's responsibility to sponsor and arrange the necessary visa for the maids. We support you to navigate the hiring process effectively.

question7.q: Do you have full-time maids or part-time maids?
question7.a: We maintain the profiles of both full-time maids for live-in arrangements and part-time maids who are available on a flexible basis. We have a wide range of options, including Indian maids, Filipino maids, Indonesian maids, and many more. Our part-time maids are available for monthly, weekly, and hourly services providing the flexibility you require for domestic help..

question8.q: What are the regions of UAE where you provide nanny services?
question8.a: We provide nanny services across all seven emirates of the United Arab Emirates (UAE). Our coverage includes:
question8.a2: Whether you reside in the vibrant city of Dubai, the capital city of Abu Dhabi, or any other emirate in the UAE, PickMyMaid is dedicated to offering reliable and professional nanny services to meet your family's needs. If you have any questions regarding our service coverage or need assistance in selecting the right nanny for your requirements, please don't hesitate to reach out to us.

question9.q: What are the regions of UAE where you provide maid services?
question9.a: We provide maid services across all seven emirates of the United Arab Emirates (UAE). Our coverage includes:
question9.a2: Whether you reside in the bustling city of Dubai, the serene coastal areas of Fujairah, or any other emirate in the UAE, PickMyMaid is committed to offering reliable and professional maid services to meet your household needs. If you have any inquiries regarding our service coverage or need assistance in selecting the right maid for your requirements, please feel free to contact us.

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.subTitle: Have an inquiry or some feedback for us? Fill out the form below to contact our team

banner.heading: About Us
banner.description: Find the perfect maids and nannies you want to hire. We will make it easier. Our commitment is to provide reliable, efficient, and personalized service, ensuring the safety and satisfaction of both families and household helpers.

mission.heading: Our Mission and Values
mission.description: Our mission is to present a reliable and efficient platform for UAE families to find trusted and skilled maids and nannies. Our values center around integrity, professionalism, and transparency. We prioritize the safety and well-being of families through rigorous screening and background checks. We foster strong relationships built on trust and respect between families and helpers. We aim to make a positive impact on households by facilitating long-lasting matches that contribute to harmonious and nurturing environments for both families and household helpers.

team.heading: Our Team & what we do
team.description:
We connect UAE families with trusted maids and nannies. We function collaboratively with a community of experienced and skilled caregivers and household helpers.
        With years of industry experience, we understand every family's unique needs and expectations. We minimize your efforts and let you find qualified and pre-screened candidates.
        Our team ensures that all helpers have undergone thorough background checks, prioritizing trust. With personalized service and a commitment to excellence, we find you the perfect household helper, making your life easier and more enjoyable.
        Our platform is SHAMS registered and allows nannies and maids to register in our database. We select them and add their profiles to our website after accurate filtering. Families who are looking for trustworthy and caring maid service can browse our database and find suitable matches according to availability, location, monthly pay, etc. We follow all the newest rules and regulations for hiring nannies and maids in the UAE. However, we don't directly handle their hiring and sponsorship. If necessary, we can provide you with contact information for companies we have worked with that can assist you in that process.

banner.heading: All Maids/Nannies are in The UAE Now

description.india: Looking for an Indian maid? Choose pickmymaid, your perfect destination. Embrace the diversity of Indian culture, enriched by various groups across the country. Experience the positive energy, beautiful traditions, and genuine care that unites them. Find a reliable and caring maid or nanny who will provide great support at home, whether for kids or elderly family members. Indian maids are renowned for their hard work and cheerful demeanor. And dont miss out on learning incredible recipes from the delightful Indian cuisine.
description.philippines: At PickMyMaid, we take pride in connecting families with experienced Filipino maids who possess a wealth of knowledge in household management. Our Filipino maids excel in creating a clean and organized living environment, handling meal preparation, and maintaining a hygienic space. Their warm and friendly behavior combined with their exceptional skills make them an invaluable asset to any household. Discover the perfect Filipino maid for your home with Pickmymaid.
description.nepal: Pickmymaid offers skilled and dependable Nepali maids to cater to your household needs. Our Nepali maids are recognized for their hardworking nature, professionalism, and commitment to delivering exceptional service. With their meticulous approach and attention to detail, they ensure a clean, well-organized, and comfortable living space for you and your family. Trust Pickmymaid to connect you with a capable Nepali maid who will bring professionalism and reliability to your home.
description.srilanka: Pickmymaid is your trusted source for connecting with dedicated Sri Lankan maids who excel in delivering top-quality service. Our Sri Lankan maids are known for their attention to detail, reliability, and ability to handle multiple tasks with ease. From general cleaning and laundry to assisting with daily household chores, they ensure a well-maintained and comfortable living environment. Count on Pickmymaid to match you with a competent and responsible Sri Lankan maid who will bring a sense of tranquility and order to your home
description.indonesia: We understand the significance of finding a competent and trustworthy maid for your household. Thats why we specialize in connecting families with skilled Indonesian maids known for their reliability and expertise. Our Indonesian maids excel in managing various household tasks, including cleaning, cooking, and childcare. With their friendly and professional attitude, they create a comfortable and well-maintained home environment. Let Pickmymaid match you with a reliable Indonesian maid who will bring efficiency and peace of mind to your household.
description.forAll: Are you in need of reliable and skilled domestic help within the country? Look no further than Pickmymaid! We are proud to offer a diverse selection of Indian, Filipino, Nepali, Indonesian, and Sri Lankan maids and nannies. Whether you require assistance with housekeeping, childcare, or other domestic services, we have the perfect solution for you. Our team at Pickmymaid is dedicated to ensuring that you find the ideal match to meet your specific needs. With our professionals, you can rest assured that you will receive top-quality care and trustworthy service. Experience the peace of mind that comes with having capable and experienced individuals looking after your home and loved ones. Choose Pickmymaid today and enjoy the convenience and reliability of our professional domestic services.
